strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all formations.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Blood Ravens with Ordo Malleus allies

sections.name: Blood Ravens Formations
sections.description: One Orbital Support formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace the Light Cruiser with a Grey Knights Strike Cruiser: 75 points

formations.name: Tacticals
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, four Tacticals plus transport

formations.name: Devastators
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, four Devastators plus transport

formations.name: Assaults
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, four Assaults

formations.name: Bikes
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, any five of the following units: Assault Bikes, Attack Bike

formations.name: Vindicators
formations.units: One Blood Ravens Librarian, four Vindicators

sections.name: Grey Knights Detachments
sections.description: One Grey Knights Detachment may be taken per Blood Ravens Detachment

formations.name: Interceptor Squads
formations.units: One Justicar, three Grey Knights Interceptor Squads

formations.name: Strike Squads
formations.units: One Justicar, three Grey Knights Strike Squads plus transport

formations.name: Purgation Squads
formations.units: One Justicar, three Grey Knights Purgation Squads plus transport

formations.name: Terminators
formations.units: One Justicar, two Grey Knights Terminators

formations.name: Dreadknights
extraUnits: Add one additional Nemesis Dreadknight: 100 points

sections.name: Blood Ravens Aircraft
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: (0-1 per army) Supreme Commander
items.description: Replace a Blood Ravens Librarian with a Blood Ravens Supreme Commander, or a Justicar with a Grey Knights Grand Master

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Dreadnoughts or Hellfire Dreadnoughts

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders or Land Raider Helios (Whirlwind or Hyperios), up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Vortimer Razorbacks
items.description: Add up to three Vortimer Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Grey Knights Support
items.description: Add one of the following options to the formation
points: Up to two Doomglaive Dreadnoughts: 50 points each
Up to two Vortimer Land Raiders: 50 points each
One Vortimer Land Raider Redeemer: 50 points
